title: 820-00163 not Video
message: Good afternoon, at first this mac turns on but the image varies sometimes and locks, replaces the u9300 with a new ISL62882c, in tests the mac turns on but without image, can you tell me which pads I can test to identify if this component I bought is defective ?

title: 820-00163 not Video
message:
Do you get correct voltage at U9330/60?
If not, check pins 16, 17, 25, 38.

title: 820-00163 not Video
message: I disconnected, but still with the accelerated cooler, which component is responsible for the GPU 2 Die sensor?

title: 820-00163 not Video
message: I disconnected, but still with the accelerated cooler, which component is responsible for the GPU 2 Die ? when I took the IC I ended up bumping into some components could you tell me if the R9314 its value is 1MΩ in the electrical scheme ? And if it has a resistor right there.

title: 820-00163 not Video
message: R9314 is 5.1K and must be placed.

title: 820-00163 not Video
message:
R9314 It's ok.
Still with accelerated cooler, I need to know when the u9300 terminal is responsible for the GPU sensor ?

title: 820-00163 not Video
message:
Both heatpipe temps still high?
Check in System Report which graphics card is in use.
Be sure all components are in place.

title: 820-00163 not Video
message: How can I verify with measurements if the Defect is on the GPU or u9300 ?

title: 820-00163 not Video
message:
There should be a sensor issue, or device connected in the same bus.
You have heatpipe temp errors, apart of GPU die.

title: 820-00163 not Video
message: stops video, replaces the u9300, but there was no result. The GPU is getting too hot, if I try a REFLOW ?
